item.title: Witkoff to meet Zelensky for latest Ukraine war talks
item.description: Donald Trump's envoy will meet the Ukrainian president and European leaders in Berlin to discuss the latest peace plan.

item.title: Thailand-Cambodia fighting continues after Trump says countries agree to ceasefire
item.description: Thai PM says he told US president a ceasefire is only possible after Cambodia had withdrawn all its forces.

item.title: New photos from Epstein estate show Trump, Andrew and Bill Clinton
item.description: The photos, which do not imply wrongdoing, are part of a trove of images the House Oversight Committee received from Epstein's estate.

item.title: From booze to black belts: Virginia's drunk raccoon suspected in karate shop break-in
item.description: The "trashed panda" is also suspected of burglarising snacks from the Department of Motor Vehicles.

item.title: Trump's 'historic' peace deal for DR Congo shattered after rebels seize key city
item.description: The recent Washington Accord was hailed as "historic" by the US president but the fighting continues.
